data.msg: hey guys, what's up?
just exploring some new areas, how about you?
I'm looking for the legendary sword, anyone want to join me?
sure, I'm in. Where should we meet?
let's meet at the castle in 30 minutes
sounds good to me
I've found the sword, meet me at the castle if you want to see it!
on my way!
this is amazing, I've never seen a sword like this before!
I know, right? It took me forever to find it!
let's go celebrate at the tavern
I'm buying the first round!
cheers!
cheers!
hey guys, can I join you?
of course, the more the merrier!
we were just celebrating my victory, want to join us at the tavern?
I'm in!
I'll see you guys there!
Anyone has any tips for finding a good spot to farm gold?
@4 do you have any suggestions?
@2 can you help me clear the dungeon at level 10?
@4 thanks for the tip, I'll try that!
@3 sure, I can help you with that!
@1 I heard there's a secret area near the mountains, have you checked it out?
I'm up for anything!
@2 thanks for your help, you're awesome!
I'm heading to the mountains to check it out, wanna join me @1?
@3 sure, let's go together!
@4 wanna come with us?
@2 I'll help you with that after we finish this quest
@5 do you know where to find the blue key?
@1 yes, it's inside the locked chest at level 8
Thanks, @5!
@4 you're so strong, can you give me some tips on how to level up faster?
@3 sure, we can grind together later!
@1 I found a rare item! Wanna see it?
@2 nice, show me!
@4 we should form a party and do some dungeons later
@2 I'm in!
I'm logging off for now, bye guys!
@1 let me know when you're ready to go on that adventure
